package step4;

public class MyRunnable implements Runnable {
         private int b;
         public MyRunnable(int b) {
        	 if(b!=0)
        		 this.b=b;
         }
         public void run() {
        	 int result=1;
        	 try {
				Thread.currentThread().sleep(1000);
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
        	 for (int i = 1; i <=b ; i++) {
				result=result*i;
			}
        	 System.out.println(result);
         }
}
